Class CommandHandler

java.lang.Object
grab.szan.commands.CommandHandler
public class CommandHandler extends Object
A class responsible for mapping string commands to their corresponding Command implementations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addCommand(String commandLine, Command executable)
    Adds a command mapping to the command map.
    Command
    getCommand(String commandLine)
    Retrieves a Command object corresponding to the given command string.
    static CommandHandler
    getCommandHandler()
    Provides a singleton instance of CommandHandler.

  • Method Details

    • getCommandHandler

      public static CommandHandler getCommandHandler()
      Provides a singleton instance of CommandHandler.
      Returns:
      the singleton CommandHandler instance

    • addCommand

      public void addCommand(String commandLine, Command executable)
      Adds a command mapping to the command map.
      Parameters:
      commandLine - the string representing the command
      executable - the Command implementation

    • getCommand

      public Command getCommand(String commandLine)
      Retrieves a Command object corresponding to the given command string.
      Parameters:
      commandLine - the input command string
      Returns:
      the Command if it exists
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the command does not exist in the map
